5213.quoteText: To register for an account you must be at least 13 years old. To give or receive pledges you must be at least 18 years old or have your parent’s permission. If you know a user is under the age of 13, please report them to us.
5213.title: This service is only available to users 13 years old and over; pledges are only for users at least 18 years old or with parental permission

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "To register for an account you must be at least 13 years old. To give or receive pledges you must be at least 18 years old or have your parent’s permission. If you know a user is under the age of 13, please report them to us."

5214.quoteText: You are responsible for anything that occurs when anyone is signed in to your account, as well as the security of the account. If you believe your account is compromised, you must contact us immediately.
5214.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use state, "You are responsible for anything that occurs when anyone is signed in to your account, as well as the security of the account. If you believe your account is compromised, you must contact us immediately."

5217.quoteText: Our service does not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means our third party analytics providers may associate your usage on Patreon with your usage on other sites.
5217.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

6345.quoteText: If a dispute does arise out of these terms or related to your use of Patreon, and it cannot be resolved after you talk with us, then it must be resolved by arbitration.
6345.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

6484.quoteText: You waive your right to trial by jury and your right to participate in a class action proceeding.
6484.title: You waive your right to a class action.

6957.quoteText:
Do-not-track” technologies

We do not respond to web browser “Do-Not-Track” signals.
